mapper.insert: insert into board (title, content, user_id, viewcnt) values(#{title}, #{content}, #{user_id}, 0 )
mapper.select: select bno, title, content, user_id, regdate, viewcnt from board where bno > 0 order by bno desc
select bno, title, content, user_id, regdate, viewcnt from board where bno = #{bno}
